moves.description: Set up Playwright MCP for mobile visual regression and functional testing.
moves.details: Configure Playwright MCP to run tests at 320px, 375px, 414px, and 480px widths.

moves.description: Test and iterate on nav-bar section for pixel-perfect and functional alignment.
moves.details: Compare src/sections/nav-bar.html to ref-png/nav-bar.png at all breakpoints. Fix any issues found.

Run Playwright MCP across the entire site at all breakpoints. Ensure logical flow, aesthetics, and no regressions. Present for user review.
